title: [ST] ZK removal from STs - regression tests and migration

body:
### Type of change

- Refactoring

### Description

First part of ZK removal from STs - mainly from the regression tests and it also removes the migration ST, as the code for that was removed as well.
The upgrade/downgrade tests + cleanup of util methods will be done in different PRs.

### Checklist

- [x] Make sure all tests pass
- [x] Update documentation
